roleset.name: go beyond (may be spiritual/mystical)

example.name: semi-spiritual
example.text: There is also a sense, as one worker at BEST says , of *PRO* transcending time and space, a feeling *0* only people who *T* 've been there can understand *T*.

example.name: non-spiritual
example.text: As [Taiwan]-9 attempts [*]-9 to transcend May Forth, the mainland is eager * to return to it.

example.name: no subject
example.text: But rather than * stirring rage and tragic acts of revenge, [those sentiments]-9 have been transcended [*]-9, so that Green Island is now site of Asia's first monument to human rights.
example.arg: so that Green Island is now site of Asia's first monument to human rights.
